website_summaries.verdict: A premium bag that provides plenty of space for a lot of small items and equipment without feeling bulky.
pros: Smooth fabric finish hides surface blemishes well
Two separated and insulated compartments for pump and bottles
Primary storage compartment is easy to access when you need to get something out quickly
Side pockets are big enough for toys and devices
cons: Lacks a comfortable shoulder strap to use for longer durations

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit Spectra S2 in side pocket
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag but ultimately had to return it for two reasons. The biggest is it doesn’t fit the Spectra S2 in the side pocket. You could fit it in the main pocket but doesn’t that defeat the purpose? There’s literally no way to get it in the side pocket... my husband and I were stumped because the description and reviews said it fits. The second reason is the zippers - they are extremely cheap and difficult to open. The first time I tried to open a side pocket, the zipper got stuck. Ultimately it’s a beautiful bag so I’m sad that it didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Spectra s1 but it’s a struggle to get in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to replace my bananafish savana bag that was stolen from my car. This was the only bag I could find that could for my Spectra s1 that also had ample storage space for a cooler bag that could fit full Sized bottles . The trick to getting the Spectra in is to wiggle the pump sideways, and get the handle in and the rest of the pump will follow.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: Chic, structured and designed for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Kaylaa Black bag to store my spectra pump and use during a businesss trip abroad. The sturdy and structured design made a huge difference as I traveled through the airport and during my business conference. The style and design is chic but subtle enough to not draw attention to its purpose as most bags that accompany breast pumps clearly do. The bag has lining to store my computer, makeup bag and other accessories. But it is much larger than I realized online which makes it easy to overpack ...this makes it quite heavy to carry so you will rely on the shoulder strap too. Overall very pleased and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to return to work & pump
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time leaving a review, but I am so impressed with this bag I needed to! It is beautiful and trendy looking, spacious with inner compartments. The 2 side cooler bags are perfect- I'm going to be using 1 side for the pump and the other to store it. To top it off I received an email from the company with a list of things to include with me to make sure I have everything I need to pump when I return to work. Worth every penny, I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: candace

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect! I have been searching for a bag that didn't look like a pump/diaper bag for work. I searched for about a month until I landed on this bag. All other bags were made out of cheap material or looked like a mom bag. I was also looking for specific features: easy access to the pump, ability to plug in without having to remove the pump out of the bag, space for laptop, professional looking, and designated spot for cooler. I recently took this on a business trip to Chicago and had to transport milk to and from. I was shocked when the TSA agents on boths sides were impressed with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: JWWII

customer_reviews.title: Ok as pumping bag, not good as work bag
customer_reviews.text: Was fine during maternity leave, but the spectra pump barely fits in the side compartment and I always worried I was going to break the zipper. On my first day back to work, with the added weight of a laptop, the piece that latches the shoulder strap to the bag decoratively ripped out immediately. About what I'd expect from a bag half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: I purchase this bag for traveling so I could use ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company contacted me and sent me the updated 2017 version and I definitely think it is very improved! The strap is much more sturdy and the color of the inside allows you to find things faster. I used it for another trip and it holds my pump and a many more things. Definitely recommend! ORIGINAL REVIEW: I purchase this bag for traveling so I could use it to carry my pump as well as the diaper bag contents. It's a really cute bag but it didn't even last me a trip. First the zipper broke so I couldn't zip it up, and then one side of the long strap broke, so I couldn't carry it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: arfin79

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this bag. It's roomy too. I'm disappointed tho. Only used it 4 times and the handles are peeling and stitching separating on handles as well. The zippers are tough to close too. (original review from 2016 version) -I am updating my review on this bag. After posting my original review Larry from Kaylaa bags contacted me right away with an apology and offer to replace the bag. I received the bag within a few days. I received the 2017 newer version of this bag. The zippers are much easier to use and the bag seems to be better quality than my 1st bag. I am delighted at their exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.author: melissa harford

customer_reviews.title: Large bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag was really large. I have a Madela breastpump, which isn't that big. So I returned the bag because I didn't need that much space. It would have looked silly to carry around something that looks like an overnight bag when going to pump at work when I only had my pump and a small cooler bag inside. The product quality was ok. Nothing special in my opinion. I guess for the peice I was expecting something that looked really high end.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline B

customer_reviews.title: Good, but can be better (not ideal for spectra users)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag in preparation to go back to work. I wanted something that would carry my pumping gear as well as my laptop and anything else I would normally carry to the office. From that perspective is it great. Looks nice abd professional and has enough overall space. My one issue with it is that even though it said the spectra 2 would fit in the side pocket (and it does) it is a struggle to put it in and take it out. And given that I will be using the same pump at work and at home and that it will need to be charged at least once every 2 days, this struggle is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Sapun Mispr

customer_reviews.title: Pump bag and purse
customer_reviews.text: I used this for as my pump bag and purse when I went back to work with my first and will be doing it again with my second. Ots nice because the pump fits on one side and the cooler on the other. Also since it's a side opening I never had to take my pump out of the bag other than to charge it. I also like that both side pockets are thermal-lined cause some days I oumped more than the 4 bottle cooler held and I could squeeze them in there. There's plenty of space for pump parts in the main pocket along with wallet, snacks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bessert

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially was not planning on spending this much, but I really wanted a bag that would work for me. I recently returned to work, and wanted to have one bag for pump, pumping supplies, cooler, laptop and work supplies...and my purse, phone, etc. This bag fits everything, and while it's big... it's not too big. It also doesn't look like a diaper bag! I've gotten several compliments, and am confident that i will use this bag long after I'm done breastfeeding. The insulated pockets are good size for pump and cooler, and the padded laptop pocket is any aded bonus. this bag is all I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: The bag is so nice. I've only been carrying it for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is so nice. I've only been carrying it for a couple of days, but I think it's great. I can fit my spectra s1 pump into it and all my necessary supplies and then some, so instead of hauling two or three bags into work, I can just carry this one.I also love how there are two insulated compartments, one for my pump and the other for bottles. I throw an ice pack in one and it stays cold all day, better than my other cooler bags, so perfect for storing pumped milk. On top of everything, it looks great and feels well made. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Spectra
customer_reviews.text: I so so wanted to love this bag. Loved the collapsible cooler and pump pockets. Super stylish. Unfortunately for me it failed at the most important aspect: fitting my Spectra pump. I was able to muscle it in there, but since I will be putting it in and out of the bag twice a day five days a week, I don’t want to have to fight it. This isn’t the bag for me.
customer_reviews.author: ilovelucy

customer_reviews.title: Would've given it 5 stars except.....
customer_reviews.text: The size and look of this bag is great, just what I need to take my pump and all accessories to work. I would've given this 5 stars if the silver plaque with the brand name wasn't upside down. For $125 I would think the plaque could've been placed on it correctly. I can't send it back for a new one because between shipping it back and waiting for a replacement I would not have anything to bring all of my pumping stuff to work in. So I guess I will just have to deal with it. Bummer because other than that it's a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tmcarmen

customer_reviews.title: So much space!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. There is so much space. The two insulated sections on the end of the bag are great. I am able to pack all my pumping supplies and store my pumped milk throughout the day. I also put everything that I need for work,which usually includes a pair of heels. My only complaint is there is dark staining on the inside of the bag around the edge of the insulated pockets. Slightly concerned it is from condensation.
customer_reviews.author: llamak

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. I suffered through 10 months with a tiny pumping bag and had to carry another bag for all my work stuff, plus a diaper bag. This fits my pump, all my accessories, additional supplies for just in case, snacks, my laptop and paperwork, cell phone and anything else I've had to throw in it. I highly recommend it to any other mommas looking to upgrade to one easy bag! Plus it could easily be used as a diaper bag/pumping bag for exclusively pumping mommas.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is very functional for the working mom dedicated to pumping! All the compartments are great. I have the Spectra2 pump, and the medela cooler. There is plenty of room for both, along with a sleeve for my computer and some small pockets for pens, phone, etc. All with additional space for snacks, diapers, or my work out clothes! The only thing I would recommend is to get a wet/dry bag or accessory bag for the pump parts. Also, with all that stuff it carries, just expect to get an arm work out. It gets pretty heavy, but well worth the effort in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: G. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Its a good bag for work
customer_reviews.text: Its a good bag for work. I was able to fit all my stuff including my laptop, medela pump and parts, medela cooler, small purse, diapers, wipes, lotion, snacks and water bottle. I loaded this puppy up! Only problem was is that I used the shoulder strap without unbuckling the shoulder strap flaps on the bag and the weight pulled the metal piece off. See pictures... so if you're going to use the shoulder straps be sure to release the attached parts on the bag first!
customer_reviews.author: Meemz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag! It fits my Medela Pump in Style ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag! It fits my Medela Pump in Style Advanced breast pump perfectly! The pump goes into a pocket on one side and my cooler with 4 bottles fits into the pocket on the other side very well! I can then carry all other parts, power cords, accessories in the main area of the bag. This bag is very stylish and sleek. It is a very large bag, however, so it does not fit into a desk drawer at work, but that's understandable since it's holding a lot of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Agar62

customer_reviews.title: Helping me meet my pumping goals and look great doing it!
customer_reviews.text: I planned on breastfeeding for a year but when I returned to work I felt disorganized and embarrassed by my basic bag. I cringed at the price but after about a week I decided if I wanted to meet my year goal I needed to be comfortable so I bought it and love it. Everything has a place to go and I’m constantly getting compliments on it. A couple of people have even asked where I got it so they can can get one just for traveling and not pumping. Nobody even realizes it’s a pumping bag unless I tell them. Great quality and love that it’s easy to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Kohlwey

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m a traveling military mother. This bag is wonderful! It’s within regulations, it’s easy to carry on airplanes and take through the long dreaded TSA lines. It’s small enough to keep in overhead compartment or underneath the seat while flying, yet big enough to include the pump, frozen pack and bag, wallet, day planner, iPad, and more.
customer_reviews.author: G David

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but I bought it specifically because my Spectra ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but I bought it specifically because my Spectra S2 pump was supposed to fit in one of the side pockets. It just barely fits, so I really have to struggle to get it in and out. So it's easier to just throw it in the large, main compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Every working/pumping mama should grab this bag! It’s so incredible it’s prompting my first amazon review. Even better looking in person than in the pics. I get so many compliments on the bag itself throughout LA before ppl even know that it carries a pump. I put the pump (Madela pump in style) in one side pocket and ice pack directly in the other, so the pocket itself is literally a cooler. It doubles as my work bag with the laptop pocket inside, with room to spare. Zippers are smooth, bag is well made. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: I like the bag for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag for the most part. The side zippers do not zip easily at all. I have the hardest time getting in and out of them. It seems like this would not be a problem since this is not a cheap bag. I love that both sides are insulated. But I wish one of the insulated sides was smaller. The pockets end up limiting the space inside the bag. The fabric is great and wipable. I wish it was the offered in more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gwinn

customer_reviews.title: Classy bag for a working mama!
customer_reviews.text: I am returning to work from maternity leave and really wanted a bag that could hold my pump supplies as well as my laptop so I'm not lugging around multiple bags. I was so thrilled when I saw this bag in person. It's really classy looking. I've always been a "bargain shopper" so this bag was a splurge for me. I definitely think it was worth treating myself because the quality/size/value is right.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical.
customer_reviews.text: This holds everything I need to pump at work (and additional things like my lunch) and it’s very cute. It’s not an obvious pumping bag and I’ve had several women approach me and tell me how much they like it and ask where I got it from. The insulated insides are a good idea, and I intend to continue to use the bag long after I’m done breastfeeding to store my work lunch or frozen things. I definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: L_Bo99

customer_reviews.title: It's stylish and certainly doesn't look like you're carrying around a breast pump
customer_reviews.text: The bag was bigger than I expected which was actually a pleasant surprise because t means I don't have to carry a pump bag AND a regular bag to work- everything fits in the one. It's stylish and certainly doesn't look like you're carrying around a breast pump. People actually complimented me on it thinking it was just another handbag. I use it to carry my spectra S2 and a cooler bag that fits four 6oz. It also fits my laptop and other stuff that would normally go in my work bag. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Newbienne

customer_reviews.title: This bag is fantastic. It is huge
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic. It is huge!! I can fit all pump parts in it to pump 4 times at work (possibly more parts if needed) Both bottom pockets are insulated to keep cool. Along with pump parts it also stores pump and cooler pack. Worth the money (I was hesitant at first to spend the money) The bag is gorgeous. Men at work even commented at how nice the "purse" was lol. Thank you Kaylaa bags!!!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I love the functionality of this bag. It's big enough to fit everything you need in one bag. It also helps how fashionable it looks compared to other breast pump bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Baird

customer_reviews.title: Cheap straps, functional, large
customer_reviews.text: The handle straps are cracking and breaking down after 2 mo of use, poor quality pleather, the bag is made of resilient fabric. Inside is very spacious, almost too big for me. Medala pump fits nicely with extra room for tubing and plug in the side pouch. Overall very fun bag but not worth over 100$. Would like more sturdy straps, with compact design.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Hermiller

customer_reviews.title: Great ORANGE and white bag
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag and it looks great. It is pretty big which is great for traveling. I feel like it will double as a great weekend bag/gym bag too since it has the separate side pockets you could use for shoes or sweaty clothes, toiletries, etc. I was surprised that the color is really quite orange. I thought in the pictures it looked more red. But I like it regardless so it's no big deal. I haven't really used it yet, so that's the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Harlos

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this bag for my return to work and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my return to work and was so excited. This was my first week back and not only did the zipper break but the first time I put on the shoulder strap one of the sides ripped right off. I went out of my way not to overload it. I only had my pump(spectra), my pump parts, and a small (Medela) cooler. Perhaps it was a fluke but we won't be using this one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate bag
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Kaylaa bag!. I love having to only carry one bag and having everything organized. It easily fits my laptop, my planner, my pump, my milk cooler, my wallet, my lunch, back up supplies for the pump and a change of clothes. i went from carrying a purse, my laptop bag, my lunch bag and a bag for my pump to just 1 bag.
customer_reviews.author: LCossor

customer_reviews.title: This bag looks much better than my other bags and also holds a good ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks much better than my other bags and also holds a good amount. My only issue is that it is HEAVY. I feel like I carry so many bags and this one is quite heavy, especially with a bottle of water and milk bottles in it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Really like the design of this bag. The two side cooler pockets perfectly fit a Medela InStyle on one side, and your milk + freezer pack on the other. And there is still room on the inside for your keys, phone, book, etc. The downsides for me are that my 13" MacBook Air does not fit inside the larger side pocket while inside its sleeve (though I can cram it in without it, I'd rather not do this). And the zippers are pretty tight, which caused a little trouble when airport security had to search my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Van Malssen

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to carry my pump equipment for work, and I love it. I wish the inside had more pocket space (the pockets that are available are small. Overall, it has held up great, and I've taken it to a lot of places with me. Everyone compliments how nice it looks, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pumping never looked so good!
customer_reviews.text: Writing a review under my husband's account: Love this bag! I was hesitant about the amount of money it cost but I feel that it has been well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great customer relations and great design
customer_reviews.text: Customer service department works very hard to ensure customer satisfaction. My defective bag (handles were peeling and coming unsewn) was replaced with the newest model and l love it even more than the first one I purchased. This is the best way to lug a pump back and forth to work.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Strap ripped right off - now what!?
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this 5 stars because I used sparingly for a couple months (haven't left the house much with twins) and it was great! BUT I took it on my first work trip and it fell apart. The longer strap ripped right off the bag which resulted in the zipper coming off and making it completely useless. Not fun when carrying it on a plane and trying to keep milk cool and contents inside. The material on the smaller shoulder straps is also starting to peel or chip away. Bummer as I loved this bag right away and it wasn't cheap! Hope they can make it stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Fits my pump great and holds all ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Fits my pump great and holds all my stuff for when I'm at work all day I love it
customer_reviews.author: brittany normand

customer_reviews.title: Love the pattern and size... just need new zippers!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag and use it daily for a fashionable pumping bag. It holds everything I need plus some!! Only thing I have a problem with... the zippers on the sides... for some reason they don’t zip and unzip that well and make it rather difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea lang

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be a great quality item and she is very excited to start ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife, she loves it. The bag was delivered three days earlier than expected. Looks to be a great quality item and she is very excited to start using it!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Chivleatto

customer_reviews.title: This bag is not red but it works
customer_reviews.text: The bag is made well but it's orange. I really thought it was red. I was very disappointed in the color, however, I have traveled with it since purchasing it and it's wonderful! It fits everything you could possibly think of for pumping plus more. Did I mention it was made well? I think that's more important than the ugly color.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The bag itself is very useful. I like the isolated pouches on either side
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag on July 7th and a clasp has torn already - that's less than 2 months of use! The quality of the straps are not great/kind of cheap. The bag itself is very useful. I like the isolated pouches on either side, the fact that you can fit a good amount in the main part, and the pockets for storage. I just hate that it broke so soon after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann M.

customer_reviews.title: The bag is cute and functional but both the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is cute and functional but both the zipper abs material seem cheap in quality for the price. The zipper often gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: lizlvspnk

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Large enough to put the breast pump in the side of the bag while carrying the rest of stuff for work. Everything seems of high quality material and don't for see any problems with this
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good if you need to carry a ton of stuff
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this except I think it is too big. Honestly I would return it if I was still within the time frame to do so. Good if you need to carry a ton of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used just this week and so far so good! Zippers are smooth
customer_reviews.text: Used just this week and so far so good! Zippers are smooth, which is a sign of quality in my book. Room for everything and well designed. Very pretty but definitely more orange that I thought it would be...not as red as pictured. Still got compliments on my cute bag...with no idea what was inside ;)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the Spectra breast pump well
customer_reviews.text: The material the bag is made out of doesn't seem very good quality. I returned this item because it does NOT fit the Spectra S1 breast pump without considerable effort getting it into and out of the designated pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can fit my spectra 2 pump on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can fit my spectra 2 pump on one side and bottles on the other. Sturdy zippers. Good quality and attractive bag. I wish it had another outside pocket on the front of the bag and that the top opening was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: summergirl

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the Kaylaa Bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Kaylaa Bag. I was nervous to pump at work, and overthinking what I would do with all of the pieces, bottles, and cooler of milk. The adorable bag holds everything, and the coolers on each side are a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! I am able to fit my MacBook ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I am able to fit my MacBook in this along with my basic every day purse items. I get compliments on it often. Especially when other moms realize it's a pump carrying bag. Lots of room. I fit 4-6 Madel pumping bottles, hands free bra, wipes, pump and pumping accessories all in the bottom. Only complaint one zipper is a little sticky. Other Upper is great. I use the strap to carry and it's more comfortable then the handles. Beautiful bag and I feel like it's not obvious that it is carrying my pump.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for breastfeeding mommas
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for breastfeeding mommas! There is plenty of space for the pump, parts, and even a small medela cooler. I have taken it to work and on a trip while away from baby. Great storage, durability, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily G

customer_reviews.title: Really love my new breast pumping bag
customer_reviews.text: Really love my new breast pumping bag! So much space, fits my skip hop freezer tote and all my breast pumping bottles and pumping supplies! The only thing that am not too sure about is the pockets inside, they are somewhat small, but the size of bag makes up for it with all the stuff that can fit!
customer_reviews.author: Jovanna Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Ugly orange
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this bag but I hate the color, it's more burnt orange then the red in the picture. I haven't seen this mentioned in any other reviews so maybe it's just mine? If it was red it would be 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan&Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely in love with this bag. As a teacher intern it is extremely hard for me to find a bag that I can have all my stuff and plus my pump stuff. This bag works for all of my needs. I am so happy that I spent the money and he got the bag I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not for spectra s2.
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this if you have a spectra s2. I had to force it into the compartment to that holds the pump. It big but has no room in the inside. The only good thing is it is stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My wife love the durable material
customer_reviews.text: My wife love the durable material, everything she needs fits, stylish, and fills our on the go needs. But if it was slightly bigger with more interior pockets for organizing it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Neil F.

customer_reviews.title: Handles tear easily but love the storage and style
customer_reviews.text: I love the space and organization of this bag but I've only had it a few weeks and the handles are tearing. A bit disappointing bc I read the bag had been updated and this wasnt happening anymore. I'd expect better quality for the price. Hoping the seller will contact me to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful! Has plenty of room for all your pumping ...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful! Has plenty of room for all your pumping needs and you can use it as your purse too. I take mine to work with me and whenever I know I will not be around my child to nurse. The bag has 2 large side pockets for you to keep milk cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this bag. I am hoping the zippers hold up as they are a little stiff but could just be breaking in. It is big enough to hold everything you need to pump at work and go to work. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all I like the bag not in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Bag is okay. I have been using it for 3 months and it shows some wear and tear. Over all I like the bag not in love with it. I have got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality bag and very roomy! Much better than carrying around the easily recognizable pumping bags.
customer_reviews.author: redkann16

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but needs improved zipper
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bag. Unfortunately the zippers definitely stick. Didn't think it'd bother me but it does. That aside, it works well and has plenty (but not too much) of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pumping mamas
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It perfectly holds my Spectra 2 as well as my work laptop and everyday essentials. It has cut down on all the bag I need to take to work and I feel more put together and stylish. Very discreet bag and it doesn't scream breast pump bag. I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this back
customer_reviews.text: Love this back. Fits everything I need for on the go pumping and you can't even tell it's a pumping bag. I originally was looking at the Sarah wells bags that were much more expensive but I am very glad I went with this product
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Lozinak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for work travel. Nicely fits your pump(I have a Medela), cooler bag with ice pack , laptop and accessories. Bag is stylish and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: LP1

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag! Great for carrying my pump back and forth between work, daycare and home. Stylish enough people don't know what I'm carrying and has room to transfer my milk cooler and everything else I would normally have in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: It's big as everyone says
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. It fits everything I need to bring with me to work, such as extra bottles, & other nursing necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just pulled this bag out of the box, and it is already flawed. Poor quality...I will be sending it back. I really wanted to like this bag, because from a distance the design is gorgeous. Guess I'll be ordering a Sarah Wells bag... Update: I heard from the company immediately, and they are sending a replacement bag tomorrow. I am very happy with the customer service-service like this a loyal customer makes. I can't wait to sport my new pumping bag-it truly is a beautiful bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag, but didn't fit my needs.
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice bag, but it did not hold my 15 in Macbook Pro, and the Spectra 2 was a very tight fit. So sadly, because of both of those reasons, I decided to return it. But otherwise, it was a beautiful bag!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M Berkoski

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Plenty of room for everything. Only critique is that I wish the opening of the bag was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: eapresley

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: I carry my pump to work in this bag every day and I loved it until the large strap holder ripped off the side. I have only had the bag for about 3 months. It does hold a lot of stuff including a small to medium sized laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Phelan

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, exactly what I was looking for and can ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s quite big but it needs to be to fit everything in. It looks great, exactly what I was looking for and can be used after breastfeeding for picnics!!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Omeyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! Just wish that I ordered this as soon as I went back to work!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: ... it for about 7 months and the straps look like they are busting at the seams
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for about 7 months and the straps look like they are busting at the seams. Wish it didnt do that but overall its roomy and fits all the necessary pumping articles needed.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag with so much space
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag with so much space. I'm a teacher, so I usually carry a backpack, lunch box and a pump bag, but the Kaylaa bag allows me to carry it all in one! It's also a cute pattern that matches with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag is very big and too heavy even without a pump and cooler inside
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: For the money, I'm not overly impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's big! Even with my Spectra pump in one of the side pockets, there is still room for things in the main part of the bag. There are nice pockets on the inside too. The stripe material is easy to clean off. Cons: The shoulder strap is pretty chinsy. I'm honestly worried it's going to break. The handle straps are already peeling and I've only been using it for a week. The stitching along the zippers is poorly done in several spots.
customer_reviews.author: Keesha Hart

customer_reviews.title: Average, not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag and it will work but there are a few things I would change. I'd prefer the top zipper to be longer so the bag opens wider. The zippers also are not good quality, they catch and get stuck. I would also prefer a different interior color.
customer_reviews.author: kbell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I was so tried of carrying three bags ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was so tried of carrying three bags to work everyday. This makes going to pump much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag, but agree with some of the other reviews that mention the difficult to open zippers. It takes a while to get the side pockets opened and closed. I was hoping to take this bag to work so I can pump, but know I will always be in a hurry when doing so, and think I might get too irritated trying to get things in and out of the bag. It would also be helpful if the interior wasn't such a dark color. It seems like it would be difficult to locate items in the bag. I'm still debating on if I'll keep it or not. I'm going to try to find something more functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I was looking for in a pump bag. It is much more stylish than other bags I've seen and has lots of room to hold the pump, all the accessories and anything else you would want to put inside. I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large bag looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooler pockets on each side. And it looks great too. It is doubling as my pump bag, lunch bag and purse during the week at the office.
customer_reviews.author: KBanik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag, well made, plenty of room for personal items along with pump and cooler bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shanika

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It’s so easy to use, I’ve used it for traveling before I go back to work. It fits everything.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hoss

customer_reviews.title: This bag would be great if you didn’t mind carrying a suitcase around all ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag would be great if you didn’t mind carrying a suitcase around all day. It’s functional but oversized and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is perfect and meets all of my needs. Works perfectly for the conservative work setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again or recommend
customer_reviews.text: Body strap keeps coming unclipped. Would not buy again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it broke :(.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to write a great review about this bag. It seemed like it hit the mark on all of my needs: it's roomy, sturdy, holds my laptop, pump, cooler bag, wallet, makeup bag, and pump bottles/accessories with room to spare. Unfortunately, after 4 days of use the large strap broke off on my walk into my building. Now, I have to use the small straps which is not comfortable for a 10 minute walk. Most likely, I will be returning. Such a pity since this is a great bag!!
customer_reviews.author: L.Fish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Bigger than I expected. My spectra 2 is a strange shape but fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fits Spectra Pump
customer_reviews.text: Side zipper pocket fits the Spectra pump. Plenty of space for cooler & wetbag with parts.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Jarveaux

customer_reviews.title: Just About Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's large but necessarily so. I can fit my Spectra S2, pump accessories bag, milk cooler, wallet, and makeup bag. It's a great quality bag but I have noticed some little appearance items that bother me. There's a portion of the bag that looks as if it was folded in an odd position and left some permanent creases. One zipper is a bit sticky but nothing too major. I would have given this bag 5 stars but the color is more of a pumpkin than red.
customer_reviews.author: Ninfa Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great pump bag! Lots of room and easy to organize. Got it for my wife as a gift and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: chad hinton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, can fit laptop and small items in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size , can fit laptop and small items in addition to 3 pairs of pumping parts and 6-8 empty 4 or 8 Oz bottles. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: My initial thought when I received this bag was that it was huge, more like a weekend bag instead of purse. However, by the time I packed all accessories, I had filled it up - so maybe I did need all that space. I still consider it more if a travel bag instead if something that I would take to work everyday. Three stars because it is already showing some wear after only a few uses. Not cool considering the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Britt C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It is very spacious and holds everything you need. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. Big enough to hold all things needed to pump!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Chike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag!! Very big and holds everything I need. It's also super stylish and cute
customer_reviews.author: Aaaaaa

product_meta.title: Kaylaa Premium Breast Pump Bag (Classic Black)
feature_bullets: BRAND NEW VERSION: the latest and greatest version with significant improvements based on all customer feedback. You’re guaranteed to get the best quality and the most stylish breast pump bag on the market. Go great with just about any outfit you choose for the day. A timeless design that will serve you for years.

EVERYTHING YOU NEED FOR WORKING & PUMPING. Fit most portable breast pumps, milk bottles and ice packs, plus laptop, tablet, phone, keys or credit cards, or any other necessities. Take everything with you with just one bag!

RUGGEDLY BUILT AND HOLD UP TO YOUR EVERYDAY USE. Extremely tight manufacturing tolerances result in zippers that won't snag, pinch or pull when you're in a rush. You can be confident that the bag will go with you for a long time

HELP YOU PUMP WITH EASE: Your co-workers won’t even know that you’re carrying a breast pump bag, instead they will complimenting how beautiful your bag is. So you can focus on the most important thing – pumping the golden liquid for your bundle of joy with ease, keeping up with your demanding job, and being a confident stylish mama at the same time!

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Buy from us and enjoy the best product and customer service with our risk free guarantee. If for any reason you are not thrilled with this bag, just contact us and receive a full 100 percent refund of every penny you paid – no hassles, no hard feelings, no question asked.
